creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by Dr and Mrs Sherman Lee
inscription:
throughout lower half: [ 君がちとせのかざしとぞ見る] {kimi ga chitose no kazashi to zo miru}
on back, when partially rolled, Japanese inscription
markings:
LRC, square relief: 吉隆; 大正八年　東宮殿下　御成年式ノ賀アリ　御后宮ヨリ　御祝ニ尊絵ノ文台ヲ御調製遊サレルニ際シ　雪佳ニ意匠ヲ御下命　其意匠ヲ古今集ノ春ノ歌ニテ歌絵ノ意匠ヲ奉?古今集　梅の歌　???
??　雪佳
medium: Hanging scroll, ink and color on silk
title: Plum Blossoms
